content.value: How do I get involved with Blankets for T.O.?

Like many other UTSC student organizations, Blankets for T.O. offers membership to University of Toronto students and opportunities to volunteer with us. Membership is the most direct way to support us, and members also get many perks in return! It requires a one-time fee of $10, which will go towards blanket and food donations to the homeless and setting up future events. Even without membership, you can still get involved with Blankets for T.O.: most events that we hold will be open to all, regardless of membership status!
What do I gain as a member?
Events and Volunteering Updates
As a member, you will be the first to be updated with events and volunteering offers! Members will get the first invites to guest speaker events.
Discounts
Members will be eligible for future discounts to participate in some of our paid fundraiser events and eligible for exclusive giveaways.
A Closer Connection to the Homeless

We plan on forming a bridge between Toronto's homeless population and the greater Blankets for T.O. community. In the future, this will involve letting members send written messages to the homeless when we make donations!
Discounts from our Preferred Partners
Are you a student looking towards graduate or professional school? Members are offered discounts on purchases from our preferred partners
below.
BeMo Academic Consulting
offers resources to help students succeed in applying to graduate and professional schools. Blankets for T.O. members will receive a
5% discount
for their services, up to $900, and
free access to e-books
such as BeMo's
Ultimate Guide to Medical School Admissions
and
Ultimate Guide to Multiple Mini Interview
Contact us
for a complete list of offered e-books.
The Princeton Review

offers online courses and learning materials that prepare students for writing applications and taking professional school tests like the MCAT, LSAT, OAT and DAT. Blankets for T.O. members will receive a
$400 discount
on instructor-led courses and
15% discounts
on self-paced course.
How do I sign up for membership?

Students wishing to volunteer with Blankets for T.O. or to join Blankets for T.O. as a member should stay updated with our organization by signing up below. We typically process new members near the start of every study term at the University of Toronto Scarborough. If you are unable to find a suitable time to apply and pay the $10 one-time fee, feel free to contact us any time through any method
here
and we will be able to help!
